definitions.definition: To adorn or cover with clothing ; to dress ; to supply clothes or clothing .
examples: to feed and clothe a family; to clothe oneself extravagantly

definitions.definition: To cover or invest , as if with a garment.
examples: to clothe somebody with authority or power

main_definition: ( transitive ) To adorn or cover with clothing ; to dress ; to supply clothes or clothing .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) To cover or invest , as if with a garment.
